籤詩版本二:
Inyanga ikhanya esibhakabhakeni kuthe cwaka endlini, ndivele ndabethwa ngamafu nenkungu ndiye ndawa isiqaqa.
Nceda uthandazele uxolo lwengqondo, Yunxia Powder, utshintshe isisa ngeli xesha, kwaye ubhale incwadi endlwini.
詩意:
Kule hexagram, amafu kunye nenkungu zigqume inyanga.
Gcina kwiindlela zakudala nokuba izinto azihambi.
籤詩故事一:
◇Yena uWenxiu wabulawa
Ngexesha leJiajing yoBukhosi baseMing, uHe Wenxiu waqulunqwa ngabaphathiswa abanobuqhophololo kwaye usapho lwakhe lwalusengxakini.Yena Wenxiu wancedwa nguLan Ying, iKumkanikazi yeNkulumbuso, baza bobabini batshata ngasese. U-Wenxiu watyholwa ngobuxoki ngumxhaphazi uZhang Tang waza wavalelwa entolongweni.Wahlangulwa waza waba yirhuluneli emva kokuphumelela uviwo. UWenxiu wafumana indawo akuyo uWang Lanying kwaye wanxiba njengemvumi ukuze azi. Aba babini baphinda badibana, kwaye uZhang Tang wabulawa.
聖意: Ukungakhululeki ekhaya, ndithandazela ukukhuselwa, ubunzima bezemali, ubunzima beshishini, ubunzima bomtshato, ukunqongophala kweLiujia, abahambi ngeenyawo bavalela amasimi, umonakalo wesilika, umonakalo wemfuyo, abantu abalahlekileyo, amatyala oluntu, ukufuduka, impahla elahlekileyo, ukugula, ingcwaba lentaba yaseYan'an kufuneka zilungiswe
